text: tum apni taaqath ke mutaabiq jahaa tum rehte ho, wahaa un (talaaq waali) aurto ko rakho aur unhe tang karne ke liye takleef na pahonchaao aur agar wo hamal se ho, to jab tak baccha payda ho le unhe qarch dete raha karo, phir agar tumhaare kehne se wahi doodh pilaaye to, tum unhe un ki ujrath de do aur baaham munaasib taur par mashwera kar liya karo aur agar tum aapas mein kash ma kash karo to, us ke kehne se koyi aur doodh pilaayegi
